instructions.title: Choose Your Scooter
instructions.description: Select from different scooter models, each with unique handling characteristics and special abilities.
instructions.tip: Try different scooters to find the one that matches your riding style!

instructions.title: Master the Controls
instructions.description: Use arrow keys or WASD to control your scooter. Lean into turns and maintain balance for smooth riding.
instructions.tip: Practice basic movements before attempting advanced tricks!

instructions.title: Perform Tricks
instructions.description: Hit ramps and obstacles to perform amazing stunts. Time your jumps perfectly to land spectacular tricks.
instructions.tip: Start with simple tricks and gradually increase difficulty!

instructions.title: Collect Coins
instructions.description: Gather coins along the track to unlock new scooter models and customize your ride with special upgrades.
instructions.tip: Explore different paths to find hidden coin collections!

instructions.title: Avoid Obstacles
instructions.description: Navigate through challenging obstacles and maintain your speed while keeping your scooter under control.
instructions.tip: Look ahead and plan your route to avoid crashes!

instructions.title: Beat Your Records
instructions.description: Complete tracks as fast as possible and achieve the highest scores. Challenge yourself to improve with each run!
instructions.tip: Don't give up - every run helps you improve your skills!
